repository.description: Git with a cup of tea! Painless self-hosted all-in-one software development service, including Git hosting, code review, team collaboration, package registry and CI/CD

issue.body:
Follow https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/pull/30547#discussion_r1573866519

Fix #30624

The Fomantic UI Dropdown wasn't designed to work that way, its "text" element might contain images. So the "overflow" shouldn't be added to any general dropdown text.

![image](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/assets/2114189/f6ceaabd-bc89-4bf2-baa2-a6f0324c1962)

issue.body:
Backport #30628 by @wxiaoguang

Follow https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/pull/30547#discussion_r1573866519

Fix #30624

The Fomantic UI Dropdown wasn't designed to work that way, its "text" element might contain images. So the "overflow" shouldn't be added to any general dropdown text.

![image](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/assets/2114189/f6ceaabd-bc89-4bf2-baa2-a6f0324c1962)
